solution_line_template: As some of the letters are in small envelopes, there must be {total_letters} total letters - {small_envelope_letters} letters in small envelopes = <<{total_letters}-{small_envelope_letters}={letters_in_large_envelopes}>>{letters_in_large_envelopes} letters in large envelopes.

Angel therefore used {letters_in_large_envelopes} letters / {letters_per_large_envelope} letters per large envelope = <<{letters_in_large_envelopes}/{letters_per_large_envelope}={num_large_envelopes}>>{num_large_envelopes} large envelopes.
